Html:
I don't get how to use it, is there any documentation ?
If not, how to create a new excel document and copy a sheet into it ?
And how to read and write into a document ?

There is not much documentation, it is pretty easy to use. See the home page http://exceldatareader.codeplex.com/

Would be happy if you wanted to write some, but none of the devs have much time.
Thank you, I misunderstood the use of this reader, i didn't understand that it was for read only, so I can't use it.
